name: Don't Look Back (itch) (SabrinaP, gaelleChar, Spartinus)
description:
You are being chased through the forest. If you slow down, you will be caught. Make it to the safe house, and make sure to switch on the lamp posts along the way so you can catch your breath, though briefly. Your one rule is to keep going!

Move with arrows / WASD / gamepad joystick.

Made for Unity's Create With Code 2 game jam, for the theme 'One Rule'. We used the Language Independent diversifier.
